mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS_B WHERE CB_NUM = #{cb_num} AND CB_EMAIL = #{cb_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments_p(CB_PNUM, CB_NUM, CB_PCNUM, CB_EMAIL, CB_CONTENT, CB_CRDATE, CB_UPDATE, CB_NICKNM) VALUES (#{cb_pnum}, seq_commentsb_num.nextval, #{cb_pcnum}, #{cb_email}, #{cb_content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{cb_nicknm})
mapper.select: SELECT CB_PNUM, CB_NUM, CB_PCNUM, CB_EMAIL, CB_CONTENT, CB_CRDATE, CB_UPDATE, CB_NICKNM FROM COMMENTS_B WHERE CB_PNUM = #{cb_pnum} ORDER BY CB_PCNUM ASC, CB_NUM ASC
